sentences.english: Eg. The house on the hill overlooks the village.
sentences.chinese: 從小山上的房子可以俯視村莊。

sentences.english: The turning direction of this water turbine is overlook clockwise.
sentences.chinese: 水輪機旋向爲俯視順時針。

sentences.english: Overlooking this piece of place, let a person feel there is worthy of the fairy tale world.
sentences.chinese: 俯視這片地方，讓人感覺那裏是名副其實的童話世界。

sentences.english: Top view of chamfered washer or spacer with adjustable inside and outside diameters.
sentences.chinese: 內徑和外徑都可調整的有切角的墊圈或墊片的俯視圖。

sentences.english: Drigung monastery is on a steep hill, overlooking our camp.
sentences.chinese: 止貢寺位於陡峭的山上，俯視着我們的營地。

sentences.english: The statue stared down at them with sightless eyes.
sentences.chinese: 雕像用一雙盲眼俯視着他們。

sentences.english: The great kings look down on us from those stars.
sentences.chinese: 偉大的君王們正從星星上俯視我們。

sentences.english: Fushi" means to look down at, or overlook."
sentences.chinese: “俯視”的意思就是從高處往下看。

sentences.english: Their room was on the third floor, its window overlooking the sportsground.
sentences.chinese: 他們的房間在三層樓上，窗戶俯視着操場。

sentences.english: We can overlook the city garden from our balcony.
sentences.chinese: 從我們的陽臺上就可以俯視城市花園。

sentences.english: She's looking down on the continued bustling activity of the main terminal concourse .
sentences.chinese: 她俯視候機主樓大廳裏持續的熙熙攘攘的活動。

sentences.english: A pair on patrol and one at high altitude on overwatch.
sentences.chinese: 一對在巡邏的時候另外一個在高空俯視。

sentences.english: Far below the plane we could see the lights of London.
sentences.chinese: 從飛機上俯視遠處可以看到倫敦的萬家燈火。

sentences.english: He was on a wide ledge overlooking the valley.
sentences.chinese: 他是在俯視谷的一個寬壁架。

sentences.english: Overlooking the land of flying Christmas video.

definition: to tilt one's head back to see (sth)/to look up at
to take in the whole scene at once/to have a panoramic view
gold and jade in glorious splendor (idiom)/fig. a dazzling sight (e.g. royal palace)
